region: 波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那

director.name: 丹尼斯·塔诺维奇 Danis Tanovic

introduction: Vedran is an unsuccessful young writer struggling to receive any kind of attention or appreciation. When he accidentally shoots a petty criminal who has been terrorizing his neighborhood, the unknown killer is acclaimed by the public as a righteous vigilante and overnight, he becomes a local superstar. Yet unable to reveal his identity, Vedran’s frustration only grows. He arrives at a life-changing decision – whether to continue his clandestine crusade.源自：https://tickets.sff.ba/films/2259
